content: I want to propose a stabilizing PR for a fairly minor library feature, but one of the things inside it has an overlap with another feature that has been proposed since it was first opened, and I believe those two things should be decided together instead of separately. Is it OK to move something from one feature to another?
seems reasonable to me, I did something similar for intra-doc links: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/77249

oh yeah, this is more about moving it to another already existing feature so they could be decided together.
but I see partial stabilization PRs can happen,
e.g. https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/78305
